statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 3 , -x^{3} + 8 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x - 5 , 3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 1 , 5 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 12 \, x + 1 , x^{3} - 22 \, x^{2} + 28 \, x + 13\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
